snippet.title: Hyperspace Throw Patrol Trailer
snippet.description:
Hyperspace Throw Patrol is a game where you control Cyber, a Throw Patrol agent that uses the power of Grab'n'Throw to bring peace and justice for the universe. This time the mission is to save a planet called Akiha, where a Giant Robot sealed all the Stars Power making the residents of the planet unable to work.

The prototype is available right now on itch.io, you can download
and help bring peace to Akiha planet:
https://gekkosdf.itch.io/hyperspace-throw-patrol
